title: Pork Wontons
ingredients: ['250g (9 oz) minced pork', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1/2 (220g) tin water chestnuts, drained and finely chopped', '1 oz bamboo shoots, drained and finely chopped', '6 spring onions, finely chopped', '75g (3 oz) beansprouts, finely chopped', '1 egg, beaten', '2 leaves pak choi, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon Chinese rice wine or sake', '60 wonton wrappers', '2L (3 1/4 pints) rapeseed oil for frying']
